comments.comment: From being a teen playing horror games to now becoming a dad, we've watched a big part of his life for all this time and it feels crazy. Congrats Felix and Marzia
i can’t believe we got to watch this man’s whole life unfold from being a teenager raging at barrels to him finally starting a family truly beautiful
Growing up as a kid, to a teen and seeing this man becoming an adult, get married and now become a father it's just, so amazing.
This kid is going to have a really interesting life
not alot of children will be able to watch their dad grow up with online videos. huge congrats guys :)

Very sweet announcement, happy for you guys.
So glad you can finally try your "feed them dog food" theory.
I'm literally crying that a Swedish man I've never met is having a baby. Congrats pewds, that baby will be loved by the entire bro army.
And it happened. Earlier today, Björn was born. Congratulations Felix and Marzia!!
We really went from a yelling at barrels to a dad. Congrats pewds.
Felix raised an entire generation of 9 year olds, now he can raise his own little one as well. Congrats to both of you, we're all so excited to see you become parents
We've all grown up with Pewd's throughout the years and to now see him about to be a dad feels surreal. Congratulations Felix and Marzia!
We've witnessed this man from shouting to barrels to having his own family. Truly the moment of all time, so proud of you pewds and marzia!
Beforehand, we were the BroArmy. Now we will be the UncleArmy.
You'll both make great parents
he's finally bjorn ️
It's so crazy to witness you getting married and having a child. I'm so happy for you both and your future together.
his kid is gunna grow up to realize their father was one of the most influential and incredible guy to bless us with his content. huge congrats Felix and Marzia!
Björn was born yesterday! Congratulations Felix and Marzia! And Happy Birthday Björn!
Happy for you guys!! Excited for this part of your lives ️
JOINING THE DAD CLUB  much love x
People who grew up watching him are now going to get to see him become a dad is almost like watching a friend of yours go through life and you're there to cheer for them. Congratulations you guy!

Late to the party, but congratulations Felix and Marzia. So beautiful to look at both of you growing up together, getting married and now a baby on the way. 
All the best, I know you guys will be the best parents!
It feels crazy that we pretty much witnessed this dude's whole life in right front of our eyes, congratulations
The man I grew up watching is gonna raise his own child. Congrats Felix. You are gonna be a great dad!
We saw this man grow up from a teen to being a dad  CONGRATS TO BOTH OF YOU
Legit had me in tears...thanks for being there to cheer me up when things weren't good. Here's to u PewDiePie
Time flies, you go from watching him yelling at a barrel to meeting an amazing girl to getting married to becoming a dad, this is so amazing

i can’t believe it, the funny shouting swedish man i grew up watching who inspired me to start making content almost 12 years ago is having a child, congratulations  you’re both gonna make such amazing parents
Congratulations Marzia & Felix!! 🥹 you‘re gonna be awesome parents

I feel fuckin old watching this. First started watching you since like 2011 with your Amnesia and happy wheels lets plays. I was 11 years old then and now being 22 and seeing that youll be a parent soon... its mind boggling. Forever a bro.

This almost feels like a movie. Watching this man go from being a silly happy wheels, amnesia playing funny guy, to his big burst into YouTube fame and now this. It feels like we've all grown and matured with Felix. He really did everything right, finding a perfect girl, marrying her, living the life of their dreams and now on his way to becoming papa Pewds. I'm very happy for you both. Much love.
It feels so weird growing up with pewds, now 25 and seeing him become a dad... It feels like I'm just watching my friend getting settled and it warms my heart.
Bro went from breeding villagers to having his own kid, happy for him .
I watched you and marzia since I was 15, I’m 28 now. Congrats guys, we’re all very happy and very proud of you
From raising a generation, to creating the next generation. Thank you for everything you've done for us PewDiePie. Congratulations to both you and Marzia!
So weird how he doesn't know any of us but we are so beyond proud of him and his accomplishments, lol
Seeing Felix go from young gaming adult to dad is crazy to see over the course of the past decade

おめでとうございます
お体に気をつけて元気な赤ちゃんを

Its all full circle now. We have watched this mans whole life since he started youtube, from living in Sweden, meeting Marzia, moving to England, getting engaged, getting married, moving to Japan and now starting a family. This is so amazing. Congratulations Pewdie pie!

This almost feels like a movie. Watching this man go from being a silly happy wheels, amnesia playing funny guy, to his big burst into YouTube fame and now this. It feels like we’ve all grown and matured with Felix. He did everything right, finding a perfect girl, marrying her, living the life of their dreams and now on his way of becoming papa Pewds. I’m very happy for you both. Much love.
I started watching Felix when I was a teenager and am now a dad of a 4-year-old. Knowing that you will be a Dad too made me tear up. I am not sure why. Maybe, I don't know. Congratulations Felix.
Marzia is going to be an awesome mother
you raised an entire generation, and we are here to watch you raise your child. You're gonna be a great father. <3

Holy shit, I watched a man who went from playing games in his kitchen yelling about barrels to being a boyfriend , then becoming a husband, and now a father?!?!? What a beautiful journey we’ve been through together and I hope nothing but the best for both you and your family.

Wow... 14 years, 14 years of being a bro and now i see.. the guy that raised me basically, getting married, and now even becoming a dad. You have no idea how excited i am for the both of you. You'll be great parents, there'll be tough times, as there always are, but you'll both do great. Thank you both for everything, and happy new chapter of this adventure you share with each other and us.
Welcome to the family, Björn!
Feels unreal watching you go from screaming about barrels and making friends with inanimate objects to being a father brings me so much joy

To think, he went from a brofist, to becoming #1, to having a child.
We're all so happy for you Felix. You're gonna be a great dad.
Congratulations!!!
My god, I watched my childhood comfort grow up to be the greatest thing out there. A dad, I'm so happy and excited to see your future blossom into something beautiful
It's amazing that he went from a teen that plays horror games to a dad that wants to have a peaceful life.

As a long time viewer who grew along with you I'm so proud of you. 
You'll make a great dad.
Congratulations Felix!! All of us are very proud of you!

I've been following you for countless years now. You've been an inspiration, a light in dark times, and a bro at all times. Pretty sure I cried this entire video. I'm so happy for you Felix. I can't wait to see how your family grows.
We can all agree that kid is gonna have an amazing jaw line

I think I just realized now that every 9 year old is truly a grown up right now 

Congratulations to felix and Marzia
He raised all of us, and now he’s gonna raise one more. :) Congratulations you two!

I still remember when Marzia said that she didn’t want any kids at the start of her YouTube career at that time and now I’m so happy for them, I seriously can’t wait and I hope they have a beautiful healthy baby no matter what, much love ️
Felix has really won the game of life, I'll always be happy about the memories we made along the way. Enjoy your beautiful life Felix and I know you'll be an amazing father.
This is actually amazing, congrats Felix and Marzia <3
From having watched since I was 8 to now being 18 and seeing you now become a father is so incredible. Such a journey
My favorite part was the last line when he referred to his own unborn child as “this kid” like you would address an online opponent. This kid is going to be legendary.
watching youtubers grow up into adulthood is crazy. Congratulations to both of you. Thank you for changing the entire internet for all of us.
Can’t believe I’ve been watching Felix since I was a kid and now he’s having a kid. Absolutely amazing. Congrats!
Man, I'm really happy for Pewds.

In like ten years the unborn baby will be watching and reading these comments, kid your dad is an amazing dude and helps millions got through though times and make them smile from Being a teen screaming at horror games to being a dad the YouTube community has grown up with him he’s amazingly kind and absolutely legendary! This will serve as a time capsule have a nice life kid. Congrats pends and Marcia
He raised a whole generation, now he’s raising one of his very own. His kid will hopefully continue his legacy. Big congratulations. ️
From screaming at barrels to raising us 9 year olds, and to a dad of his own child, We love you pewds..
Congratulations Felix. I am so damn proud of you
CONGRATULATIONS DUDE

As the years have passed, we as viewers have literally watched Pewds mature and progress in life. Some might say it is bad for his private life, but we, as his audience and well wishers, are absolutely stoked to see him grow over the years. Congratulations on becoming a father, Pewds.

The journey this man has gone through over the last 12 years on YouTube is insane. From a immature, young adult selling hotdogs and uploading horror games on the side to a successful, married, mature man (and soon to be father). Even with how private Felix is on YouTube, it's amazing that we can still watch an entire life unfold over the course of all these years.
From being a teen playing horror games to being a father, we have watched him grow, we are proud of you Felix, You have made our childhoods much better and I hope life treats you well, Thank you.
Congrats. This kid will be unstoppable. This kid will have a Swedish dad and an Italian mother that both speak English while living in Japan. Their child might learn 4 languages, that's crazy.
I’ve literally grown up watching Felix, and he helped me grow so much. I can’t believe he’s gonna be a dad because he’s done so much for me. Congratulations

This legit made me cry. You've come a long way Pewds and it's so surreal that I started watching you around 10 years ago, seeing you get married, settle down in Japan and now ready to become a father. We're all so happy for you Pewds!!! Wishing you the absolute best
it feels like a big brother is about to become a dad it's amazing we all love you felix and marzia congratulations to you both
You've been a part of many people's childhood, including me. And now you'll be having a baby! Congrats, Felix. We're proud of you!

The nostalgia hit like crazy. From watching pewds recording horror games in the kitchen to having the first child. It's such a long journey thinking about it, how far we've come. We all really wish you the best Felix, thank you so much for everything, congratulations!
To think 10 years ago this man was screaming at barrels. Congratulations to the both of you. We have no doubt you'll be amazing parents.

Been watching his videos since I was in middle school. Nearing the end of high school now. This was like a reminder that I’ve grown, and some of my favourite Youtubers have grown too! Gaming to being a dad, he’s come a long way man, he deserves the good life.

It’s so crazy to think I’ve been watching you since I was about 11-12 years old. I’m going to be turning 24 in a couple weeks and we have all grown so much with you Felix. You’ve changed and have accomplished so much in your life and you will be an amazing father, just like how you have been an amazing creator and friend to all of us. Congratulations Pewds!

It's crazy how he started youtube as a teen playing a horror game, selling hotdogs and to becoming a dad, he basically recorded his life journey and I'm glad to witness it. This video really put a smile on my face as well as to millions of 19 year olds. Anyways CONGRATULATIONS PEWS AND MARZIA!
Holy crap, this is surreal. One year he was a gaming youtuber, the next he was the biggest youtuber, another year passed by and he was a reaction channel, and now he's a dad. Absolutely incredible.

I became a Dad last year and it was the single most life changing event of my life. It made me one of the happiest people alive and I would do anything for my Daughter. Congrats to you both the journey you are about take truly is the one of the best things in the world and I know you will both me amazing parents

This kid will know English, Italian, Japanese, and Swedish. 

They will be such great parents! I’ve been watching pewds since 2015 I think and it’s just so nice to see how much he and Marzia have grown, you can feel the love between them through the screen. This kid will be one very loved baby! 

Congratulations!
I’m turning 20 in April, I’ve been watching since I was like 9… this is insane. We’re all so happy and excited for you and Marzia!
A baby with Swedish and Italian parents that will be born in Japan and probably grow up quadrilingual. Congratulations! So excited to see the amazing life you give to this baby!
literal tears. i’m so happy for the both of y’all. many congratulations
We are all growing up :’) huge congrats you two!!!!🥹🫶

Listening to Felix gush about Marzia made me burst into tears.  These people honestly and fully love one another, and they will be wonderful parents.  Felix has grown up so much over the years.  This will be the luckiest kid.

Congratulations, you two.  Hoping for a smooth pregnancy for Marzia and a lovely future for the whole family!
damn. this made me emotional, i’ve literally grown up watching this guy. i’ve seen his channel grow. i’m so happy for you.

I’m so happy for you pewds. I know Both you and Marzia will be wonderful parents. 

Time sure does fly huh. I’m kinda scared tbh. Feels like just a couple months ago I subscribed. But it’s actually been 10 years. I think what has made me stay is the wholesomeness of your personality more than anything.
you raised so many kids through millions of screens and now you get to raise your very own  my heart is actually sobbing.
It’s crazy how he grew up a whole generation of kids, and now is having his own. Congratulations. Felix and Marzia

This is just so surreal, I grew up watching Pewds playing horror games, happy wheel, dressing up in ridiculous costumes and literally making history. Now he's having a child and soon enough will be a father. Congrats, so happy for you guys!
So good to see you two still together after all this time, and starting a family. Congrats and all the best for the future.
Funny how we're just strangers on the internet but, hearing this, it feels like a friend is having a baby. Congrats to the both of you!
Amazing news!! Congrats!!!

It's insane how we've been with this man since the beginning. Felix and marzia getting together, getting married.. and now having a kid!!
All I'm trying to say is that it's been one hell of a ride and I'm glad that to this day Felix is still taking us along with him as his fans <3
